description:
Make the most of unittest.mock when testing

The Python standard library comes with a great tool for helping you
write isolated unit tests: unittest.mock. But, as evident from Stack
Overflow questions on the subject, many people struggle to understand
how to use the library correctly. This talk will help you understand how
to use unitest.mock effectively, with the help of a few problems
inspired by those Stack Overflow posts.

This talk is aimed at people that already know how to write unittests,
but want to know how to get the most out of unittest.mock.
title: How not to make a mockery of it
